author: pi118
content: Hello, kiln test net to send to me, thank you

author: parithosh
content: Yup, I'll def hand out kiln configs well ahead of time.

author: parithosh
content:
Configs for `merge-devnet-5` are out now: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/merge-devnet-5

CL genesis only happens tomorrow at 4 UTC, so everyone participating should have enough time. 

EL genesis has already occurred, TTD is set 100x more than last times so we should be in PoW mode for a few days. 

Links to tooling will be shared shortly
